response.overview: That summer,Ji Qingqing was 22 years old.Before leaving the small town,she wanted to catch a glimpse of the wife of her mother's extramarital affair partner.She was curious about what kind of life that woman Peng Yun led after her divorce.Qingqing approached her gingerly,unwittingly found herself falling in love.When Qingqing earnestly expressed her love and proposed taking Peng Yun to live in the city,Peng Yun hesitated... However,a phone call shattered the intimacy between them...
response.title: When we meet
